column4: Hi, my external drive is not automounting. Any suggestions as to what could be wrong?
What format is it? NTFS?
yea
Are you using feisty?
yep
Then you need to install ntfs-g3. Just go the Add/Remove programs and search for "ntfs"
but it used to automount even if it was read only
Did you try going to System -> Preferences -> Removable Drives and Media and see if auto-mount is enabled?
it was automounting fine until I installed ntfs-3g but apparently after that it would never automount so I uninstalled it and after that its always like this
ntfs-3g is considered rather buggy in fiesty. However, it has been fixed in Gusty.
it was working fine for me in edgy
any other way so it can automount on plugin ?
Not that I can think of. But I'm not a guru. So I'm very sorry I couldn't help you much. :(
np but ty for the help
did you do with sudo?
how do u install ubuntu-desktop with all dependencies?
sudo aptitude update && sudo aptitude install ubuntu-desktop
np
whats diff between aptitude and apt-get?
diff ways to do the same thing...
what does aptitude do?
http://psychocats.net/ubuntu/aptitude
